parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation

parameters.description: Random seed. Set for reproducible generation

parameters.name: go_fast

param_schema.title: Go Fast
param_schema.description: Run faster predictions with model optimized for speed (currently fp8 quantized); disable to run in original bf16. Note that outputs will not be deterministic when this is enabled, even if you set a seed.

parameters.description: Run faster predictions with model optimized for speed (currently fp8 quantized); disable to run in original bf16. Note that outputs will not be deterministic when this is enabled, even if you set a seed.

parameters.name: megapixels

param_schema.description: Approximate number of megapixels for generated image

parameters.description: Approximate number of megapixels for generated image

parameters.name: aspect_ratio

param_schema.description: Aspect ratio for the generated image

parameters.description: Aspect ratio for the generated image

parameters.name: output_quality

param_schema.title: Output Quality
param_schema.description: Quality when saving the output images, from 0 to 100. 100 is best quality, 0 is lowest quality. Not relevant for .png outputs

parameters.description: Quality when saving the output images, from 0 to 100. 100 is best quality, 0 is lowest quality. Not relevant for .png outputs

parameters.name: num_inference_steps

param_schema.title: Num Inference Steps
param_schema.description: Number of denoising steps. 4 is recommended, and lower number of steps produce lower quality outputs, faster.

parameters.description: Number of denoising steps. 4 is recommended, and lower number of steps produce lower quality outputs, faster.

parameters.name: disable_safety_checker

param_schema.title: Disable Safety Checker
param_schema.description: Disable safety checker for generated images.

parameters.description: Disable safety checker for generated images.
